newsitem.title: TUNISIA: Iran invites Tunisian President to Islamic Summit.
newsitem.headline: Iran invites Tunisian President to Islamic Summit.

text.p: Iranian Foreign Minister Ali Akbar Velayati on Tuesday handed Tunisian President Zine al-Abidine Ben Ali an invitation to an Islamic Summit in December in Tehran, officials said.
Ben Ali accepted the invitation from Iranian President Akbar Hashemi Rafsanjani, Velayati told reporters after the meeting.
"President Ben Ali expressed his satisfaction with the relations between Tunisia and Iran," he added.
The Iranian minister was in Libya on Sunday where he handed a similar invitation to Libyan leader Muammar Gaddafi.
